chapter.title: Getting started with yocto on Ubuntu

section.title: Install Required packages
section.para: Following packages need to install on ubuntu machine
section.literallayout: $ sudo apt-get install gawk wget git-core diffstat unzip texinfo gcc-multilib \ build-essential chrpath socat cpio python3 python3-pip python3-pexpect \ xz-utils debianutils iputils-ping python3-git python3-jinja2 libegl1-mesa libsdl1.2-dev \ pylint3 xterm
section.para: Following packages need to install for building yocto documentation reference manual
section.literallayout: $ sudo apt-get install make xsltproc docbook-utils fop dblatex xmlto
